subsection.name: Nested Elements
subsection.p: The info element may contain any number of the property elements.

tr.td: Declaration of a named value pair.

subsection.name: Nested component example
subsection.pre: <type class="net.dpml.test.composite.CompositeComponent" name="parent"> <parts> <component type="net.dpml.test.composite.ChildComponent" key="primary"> <context> <entry key="color" method="RED"/> </context> </component> <component type="net.dpml.test.composite.ChildComponent" key="secondary"> <context> <entry key="color" method="BLUE"/> </context> </component> </parts> </type>
